image_prompts.intent: show crowd instability under diegetic pluck rhythm
image_prompts.image_prompt: Medium shot of the Hydrogen Crowd collapsing and recovering in synchronized waves on tatami as a pluck beat tilts the room axis, with crisp silhouettes and controlled motion blur.

image_prompts.intent: introduce lure behavior of the Geisha
image_prompts.image_prompt: Frontal theatrical composition of a Geisha on a raised dais making a precise fan gesture while the crowd takes one obedient step, framed by layered paper screens and lacquered wood rails.

image_prompts.image_prompt: Close-up of a shoji silhouette where the shadow pose misaligns with the performer's still body for one uncanny beat, with dense ink shadows and warm paper texture.

image_prompts.intent: marking moment that stabilizes the crowd
image_prompts.image_prompt: Central ring composition as the crowd freezes in a clean stance around the Geisha and a cyan contrast mark appears on a turning wrist, keeping shapes graphic and readable.

image_prompts.image_prompt: Final wide shot of the Infinity Castle pausing after a soft pluck, Gadolinium standing still while the Geisha is trapped inside the circle she once controlled, red and cyan accents used sparingly.
